review: This was a life saver for my husband and I! Works great and we haven't had any issues at all.
author: JulieBEE

review: Yup, works like a champ.  Basic equipment for me, and small enough to travel so I can find watchable programming from wherever I find myself.  Well, as long as there is a good wifi connection, at least.  But one step at a time, right?
author: Chris V.

review: Excelente, conectó perfecto en mi televisor con los cables que trae, enlazó adecuadamente con el telefono y se pide las actualizaciones de una forma sencilla. La instalacion es facil, solo se sigue la guia o las especificaciones de google chromecast en internet.
author: jessica.caro.sanchez

review: Alright, if your phone has chromecast. If not, then you're screwed.
author: smitty

review: Great idea and a good product, but there really aren't too many compatible apps for it.
author: Timothy Doherty

review: Awesome!  We watched the entire series of HBO's Game of Thrones using this from our ipad with HBOGO!
author: Jenni Bryan

review: Simple set up and works seamlessly.
author: ebhovi01

review: This just saved me ~1400 annually. Was paying too much for cable. Now I can cancel it.
author: Christina

review: Love it!  Easy to use and install.  Great price
author: Alison P O'Dowd
